meanings.definition: A collection of quatrains, typically in Persian poetry.
meanings.sent1: The teacher read a beautiful rubaiyat to the class.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the rubaiyat of Omar Khayyam.
meanings.sent3: The rubaiyat book made everyone smile with its funny poems.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a rubaiyat of memories, each stanza holding a different emotion.
meanings.sent5: The rubaiyat painted vivid pictures of nature and love.

meanings.definition: A quatrain, a stanza of four lines.
meanings.sent1: He wrote a rubaiyat for his girlfriend on Valentine's Day.
meanings.sent2: The rubaiyat in the poem added depth to the story.
meanings.sent3: The rubaiyat stanza rhymed perfectly, making it easy to remember.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a rubaiyat of emotions, each line expressing a different feeling.
meanings.sent5: The rubaiyat stanza stood out as the most powerful part of the poem.
